zip file.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a computer file that has been made smaller so that it is easier to store and move
zip file.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a file that has been COMPRESSED (=made smaller) by changing the information in it into a special code, so that it uses less space when you store it. To read or use the file, you change it back into its original form
zip file.translation[1].definitions[0].e: I was sent the work in the form of a compressed zip file.
